attributes.action: REMOVE ALL GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC FUNDING FOR THE MONARCHY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE MONARCHY IS INCREDIBLY WEALTHY, OVER PRIVILEGED, AND EXISTS ONLY AS A RESULT OF ITS PERSECUTION OF OUR ANCIENT ANCESTORS AND THEFT OF THEIR PROPERTY. ALL MEN ARE BORN EQUAL SO MAKE THE MONARCHY EARN THEIR OWN LIVING LIKE EVERYONE ELSE. WE DON'T WANT TO PAY FOR THEM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
